name: Gearforged Templar
description: The Gearforged Templar is a Medium-sized constructed being representing order and law, formidable with natural armor and a solid defensive capability.
memorable: It can deal devastating area damage with its Whirlwind ability and functions without the need for air, food, drink, or sleep.
goals: To maintain order and enforce law in its surroundings, acting as a guardian.
relations: May serve other constructs or command lesser automatons in its quest to maintain order.
environment: Typically found in places of justice, such as fortresses or within the command of lawful entities.
strengths: Resistant to nonmagical physical damage and immune to various conditions and damage types.
weaknesses: Low Dexterity resulting in poor agility and initiative, average intelligence and charisma.
attacks: Can perform multiple attacks with its Greatsword or Javelins, capable of pushing enemies back and dealing significant slashing or piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Whirlwind, an area-of-effect attack that deals considerable slashing damage to nearby enemies.
senses: Has a passive Perception of 13, allowing it to notice surroundings competently.
skills: None notably skilled, relying on its constructed nature and combat abilities.
additional_information: Functions without air, food, drink, or sleep.
Can enhance its AC against an incoming melee attack using its Parry ability.
Multiattack feature allows it to strike multiple times in one turn.
Whirlwind can hit multiple targets, making it effective in controlling combat.
Can make immediate attacks when enemies enter its reach.
test_queries: formidable being without need for food
